title: City of the sixties
creator_credit: Cinesound, Brisbane City Council and Stuart Glover
brief_description: Made for the Brisbane City Council showing the advances and achievements reached by capital of Queensland, Brisbane. Contains short clips of the Council’s activities such as roads and public transport, health, childcare etc as well as a celebration of cultural achievements of the city.
